section.section: The Commission shall study possible ways to preserve and improve Annapolis as the capital of the State, with particular emphasis on the location of State offices and buildings and county and city buildings.

text.section:
The Commission may cooperate with public agencies to:
develop plans for the physical development of Annapolis and adjacent areas; and
ensure adequate access to and transportation facilities for Annapolis and adjacent areas.

section.section: A study or recommendation of the Commission is advisory only.
The Commission may not require or compel the adoption or implementation of any recommendation.
